column5: Greetings,How do I edit a post? The Edit button is not shown.Many thanks....
If you're logged in, which you are, then it should show in the bottom right corner next to the quote button. If it's not showing...I don't know...it's showing on my computer?
I think the option to edit a post is time restricted. Maybe hours, or may be days, but once the time is up, you can't edit a post. Try a test post and see how long it is before you can't edit.
Greetings,I submitted two posts this morning on another thread. The edit function timed out after about one hour and was no longer available.Kindest regards.....
I ran into this problem too (no edit option). Go to profile - Message Editor Interface - change option to "Standard Editor - extra Formatting". You should be able to edit your postings going forward.
